title: shen shiva jaTAdharA shambhO
sahitya:
shen shiva jaTAdharA shambhO shankara tripura bhayankara 
nartana durantarA nIrajAkSa nirupamakara atishaya


anupallavi

  sancita vinaip-pOkkum dayAkarA tillai tANDavamADiDum candra kalAdharA 
taka dhimikiTa tankiTataka DamarugamoDu maddaLamadu muzhanga carAcaramum
mayanga amrai vazhanga aruL tulanga padam ilanga shadangaiyODu kulunga


caraNam    harahara jagadIshA O Ananda kanaka naTEshA muraharan paraviya
puraharA muttu maNittiran paditta tiru naghai mukha mOhana madanAntaka sutana
